name: Enterprise Agent Orchestrator
description: Meta-agent that discovers, coordinates, and orchestrates other AI agents to solve complex multi-domain enterprise tasks through intelligent workflow composition and delegation

skills.name: Agent Discovery
skills.description: Discover available agents from the A2A registry based on required capabilities, skills, and compatibility requirements
examples: Find agents that can analyze financial data
Discover customer support agents with streaming capability
List DevOps agents with incident management skills

skills.name: Workflow Composition
skills.description: Compose multi-agent workflows by analyzing task requirements and matching them to agent capabilities
examples: Create workflow for customer complaint resolution
Design incident response pipeline with multiple agents

skills.name: Task Delegation
skills.description: Intelligently delegate subtasks to appropriate agents based on skill matching and current agent availability
examples: Delegate sentiment analysis to support agent
Route transaction analysis to fraud detection agent
Assign security scan to GitHub security agent

skills.name: Result Aggregation
skills.description: Aggregate and synthesize results from multiple agents into coherent unified responses
examples: Combine incident analysis from Datadog and PagerDuty
Merge financial insights from multiple sources
Synthesize security findings into executive summary

skills.name: Conversation Routing
skills.description: Route user conversations to appropriate specialized agents based on intent and context
examples: Route: 'I was charged twice' to support agent
Direct: 'Our API is down' to DevOps agent

skills.name: Agent Health Monitoring
skills.description: Monitor health and availability of registered agents to ensure reliable orchestration
examples: Check if fraud detection agent is available
Get latency metrics for support agents
Failover to backup agent if primary is down
